package.name: motoman_gp180_support

description.p: ROS-Industrial support for the Motoman GP180 (and variants).
This package contains configuration data, 3D models and launch files for Motoman GP180 series of manipulators.

Joint limits and maximum joint velocities are based on the information found in the online documentation files for the robot (GP180-120_2D.zip and GP180-120_3D.zip from https://www.cz.yaskawa.eu.com/en/products/robotics/motoman-robots/productdetail/product/gp180-120/) All urdfs are based on the default motion and joint velocity limits, unless noted otherwise.
Before using any of the configuration files and / or meshes included in this package, be sure to check they are correct for the particular robot model and configuration you intend to use them with.

package.author: Jakub Marsik
package.maintainer: G.A. vd. Hoorn (TU Delft Robotics Institute)
